A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am not one to usually post a movie review... but this is a really bad movie! Bad fight scenes which make no sense like slow bombers in this age of star fighters to stupid dialogue to dumb and regurgitated plot lines to senseless dialogue.... uggggh just one insult to the audience after another.  Love Star Wars\,but this was awful trash.... see it once if you must but it will be waste of time! Disney better get its act together and stop the politics....we just want a good fun movie\, not a lecture\,
